overview: Mesmerist Jonathan Sage escapes Nazi Germany via a cryogenic tube. In the 1980s, a group of Fascist Americans thaw him out, hoping to use him as a way to rid their community of homosexuals, free-thinkers, and other "radicals."  The story is interspersed with many rock dance numbers.  -Joe Arthur(via imdb)
tagline: If You Can't Control Your Child -- There Is Someone Who Can!
title: Strangers in Paradise
